name: Alfa
descriptionText: Quiet and peaceful location with a lot of terrain and nearby horseriding available

name: Bravo
descriptionText: Next to the YelloStone Lake, great for overnight camping. Bring your paddle boards, or rent on here on site

name: Charlie
descriptionText: Beware: bears found near this area. Also mountain lions have been seen in the area. If you see one, make loud noises

name: Delta
descriptionText: Next to the Windy Canyon hiking trail, RV camping close by. Trailers are not allowed

name: Echo
descriptionText: Closest campsite from the main entrance, can purchase tickets here. Must purchase 3 day minimum to get cafe tickets

name: Foxtrot
descriptionText: Has anyone read the Foxtrot comic book though ?

name: Golf
descriptionText: Golfing range included, please call for carts rental availability

name: Hotel
descriptionText: This campsite features a romantic getaway package included

name: India
descriptionText: See the scenic route while visting this campsite. Closest gas station is 25 miles away
